name: OR_CASE_LAST_MINUTE_CANC
description: Table enables you to report on the last minute case cancellations data.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CANCEL_DT
columns.description: Stores the cancellation date when the case is canceled at the last minute (i.e., on the day of surgery or on the day of admission).

columns.name: CANCEL_TM
columns.description: Stores the cancellation time when the case is canceled at the last minute (i.e., on the day of surgery or on the day of admission).

columns.name: CANCEL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the reason for canceling the case at the last minute (i.e., on the day of surgery or on the day of admission).
entries: Patient Did Not Follow Instructions (Comment Required)
Patient No Show Day of Surgery
Emergency Case Posted Greater Than 24 Hours

columns.name: SCHEDULED_SURGERY_DT
columns.description: Stores the scheduled surgery date when the case is canceled at the last minute (i.e., on the day of surgery or on the day of admission).

columns.name: SCHEDULED_SURGERY_TM
columns.description: Stores the scheduled surgery time when the case is canceled at the last minute (i.e., on the day of surgery or on the day of admission).
